NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Dr* Harry J. Skornia
II4. Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Congratulations on getting the placement service
where it belongs! That letter from Griffiths to
Bob left no doubt in anybody1s mind, did it?
Sincepeiy yours.
Director, Region II
W dn
